---
title: '@socialproof/mydata'
---

The deprecated `MyDataClient.asClientExtension()` static method has been removed. Use the `mydata()`
registration function instead:

```diff
- import { MyDataClient } from '@socialproof/mydata';
+ import { mydata } from '@socialproof/mydata';

- const client = mysoClient.$extend(MyDataClient.asClientExtension());
+ const client = mysoClient.$extend(mydata());
```
